name: Eight Stones
description:
Return the eight stones to their rightful place on the Monument.

In Eight Stones, a diminutive spider explores and survives eight unique areas spread across a two-dimensional map. The goal in each area is to recover the "stone", a colored object which is either guarded by hostile creatures, or locked behind a challenging puzzle.

Features:
  • Challenging combat against (and alongside) various creatures
  • Ambient soundtrack which changes and evolves dynamically as the game progresses
  • A story which, although not explicitly told, is embedded within the experience

Eight Stones is Part 1/8 of the CS8 series. Join the Centipede Studios Discord to learn more.
